channel.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops - Zombie Team [XBox]
channel.description:
Well im sick of soloing on Zombies or going online with a bunch of kids who dont know what there doing.
Im starting a Call Of Duty: Black Ops Zombie Team. If your interested in joining post here, pm me, or add my Gamertag and message me your forum name.
You must have a mic, and were only gonna do Kino and Five. The new maps suck terribly.
GamerTag: PrO X REBEL

i love five, and kino of course ill add you
